import React from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { decrementCount, deleteCount, getBasket, getTotalPrice, incrementCount, } from "../../store/catalog"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import FastLogin from "./fastRegistr"; const Basket = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const basket = useSelector(getBasket()); const res = useSelector(getTotalPrice); const handleIncrement = (id) => { dispatch(incrementCount(id)); }; const handleDecrement = (id) => { dispatch(decrementCount(id)); }; const handleDelete = (id) => { dispatch(deleteCount(id)); }; return (
{basket.length ? ( <>
{basket.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.count}
{`${item.price * item.count} руб.`}
))}

{`Итого: ${res} руб.`}

{/* */} <>

Оформление заказа

{}
) : ( <>
{" "}
В корзине нет товара.
)}
); }; export default Basket;
